Experience

Assistant to the Manager

Clean Water, Russia

June - August 2019

I worked at a small business in Russia called "Clean Water" over the summer of 2019 which delivered gallons of filtered water to people's homes. I would create the delivery path for the daily orders, tally incoming and outcoming containers to ensure customer satisfaction, and was in charge of payroll of employees.

Private Tutor

Brooklyn, New York

September 2015 - January 2020

With a strong background in STEM subjects, I offered tutoring services in subjects such as mathematics, physics and digital electronics. I would help students better their skils in not only the subject, but other important academic skills such as time management and note taking. With this passion of teaching, I as well conducted multiple English classes in Siberia.
